articles.description: Airlines' cargo businesses were lifelines during the pandemic when travel demand dried up.
articles.content:
Airlines' cargo revenue is slumping. That's a sign of good news for travel recovery.
Delta, United and American this month each reported year-over-year declines of about 40% in their second-quarter … [+2524 chars]
